sentence: I can promise you Herschel Walker is going to be in this race.
author: Tia Mitchell
title: The Jolt: Herschel Walker hits weak' U.S. leadership in Russia crisis

sentence: Senate candidate Herschel Walker is holding mostly closed-door events in Georgia, while collecting lucrative fees for private speeches mostly outside of the state.
author: Tia Mitchell
title: The Jolt: Internal poll shows voter support for Buckhead cityhood down
